Object.Field:
Author: Oracle Version: 11.1
Last Update: MAY-2008
Description: - This JKM provides consistent journalizing procedures for Oracle tables. - This Knowledge Module uses Oracle's LogMiner feature to capture data changes on the source tables. If ASYNCHRONOUS_MODE is set to "Yes", data is captured asynchronously. This KM cannot be used with Oracle versions before 10g. - The AUTO_CONFIGURATION option provides automatic configuration of the Oracle database and ensures that all prerequisites are met. As this option automatically changes database initialization parameters, it is not recommended to use it in a production environment. You should check the Create Journal step in the Sunopsis execution log to detect configurations tasks not performed correctly (Warning status).
Restrictions: - When starting the journal on a model, journals are automatically dropped from tables no longer in the set and new tables in the set are journalized. - If the table is already journalized with another model, its current journal data is lost and the table is transferred to the new CDC set. - Asynchronous mode gives the best performance on the journalized system, but this requires extra Oracle Database initialization configuration and additional privileges configuration. - Asynchronous mode requires the journalized database to be in ARCHIVELOG. Please carefully review Oracle documentation on this topic before turning this option on, to correctly manage the archives and avoid common issues: for example, if the archive files are not removed regularly from the archive repository, the Oracle instance will hang. - If ASYNCHRONOUS_MODE is set to "No", journalized data is available immediately after the commit. Otherwise, there is a gap between the commit and the journalized data availability. This time may vary from 1 second to a few minutes. - Always stop the journal before changing the ASYNCHRONOUS_MODE option.
Prerequisites: - When using asynchronous mode, the user connecting to the instance must be granted admin authorization on Oracle Streams. This is done using the DMBS_STREAMS_AUTH.GRANT_ADMIN_PRIVILEGE procedure when logged with a user already having this privilege (for example the SYSTEM user). When using the AUTO_CONFIGURATION option, this user must also have the DBA role to grant other users with privileges and change instance parameters.
Find below a sample script to create the user for AUTO_CONFIGURATION and ASYNCHRONOUS_MODE: -- -- Note: In this example, "SAS" is the name of the Oracle user connecting the database. -- This user is specified in the Data Server definition. -- Replace "SAS" with the name of your user and "XXX" with its password. --
-- -- Create the user -- create user SAS identified by XXX default tablespace USERS temporary tablespace TEMP /
-- -- Allow the user to grant system privileges to other users, to change instance parameters and to create objects -- grant dba to SAS /
-- -- Grant the user with administrator privileges for Oracle Streams (asynchronous mode only) -- BEGIN DBMS_STREAMS_AUTH.GRANT_ADMIN_PRIVILEGE(GRANTEE => 'SAS'); END; /
- The work schema must be granted the SELECT ANY TABLE privilege be able to create views referring to tables stored in other schemas. - For detailed information on all other prerequisites, refer to the Oracle documentation (Data Warehousing Guide - Change Data Capture)
Change History:
Last Update: MAY-2008 - 6958894 fixed
Last Update: NOV-2007 - Fixed minor typos
- "Create journalizing view", "Create journalizing data view": rewritten for LOB support - "Create journal": set timestamp to 'y' - "Drop temp table", "Drop useless objects", "Drop remaining objects": added purge option - "Analyze subscriber table", "Analyze table list table", "Analyze CDC set table": gathering stats using DBMS_STATS
Last Update: AUG-2006
UPDATED THE STEP "Declare table in Set"

If selected, the JKM will minimize the overhead on the source system by using the Asynchronous HotLog method in Oracle Change Data Capture.
Caution: using this option requires setting Oracle parameters including archivelog and force logging on the database. Please carefully review Oracle documentation on this topic before using these features (Data Warehousing Guide - Change Data Capture).

The AUTO_CONFIGURATION option provides automatic configuration of the Oracle database and ensures that all prerequisites are met. Note that some of these parameters cannot be changed without restarting the database. You should check the Create Journal step in the ODI execution log to detect configurations tasks not performed correctly (Warning status).
When using the AUTO_CONFIGURATION option, the connecting user must also have the DBA role to grant other users with privileges and change instance parameters.
Two parameters (PARALLEL_MAX_SERVERS and STREAMS_POOL_SIZE) are set by increasing the base value. These parameters are decreased when the journal is stopped.
In a production environment a DBA should set these parameters rather than letting ODI automatically set them.
Use this option to specify storage parameters for the journal (J$) tables. Example: TABLESPACE USERS

/* This query returns a row for each journalizing trigger, view or table if the table is no longer a part of the CDC Set */ select OBJ.DB_OBJECT_TYPE <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> DB_OBJECT_TYPE, OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> DB_OBJECT_NAME, case when upper (OBJ.DB_OBJECT_TYPE) = 'TABLE' then 'PURGE' else '' end <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> DROP_OPTION from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and CDC.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and OBJ.DB_OBJECT_TYPE in ('TRIGGER', 'VIEW', 'TABLE') and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,"SNP_TMP_TABLE_LIST" , "W")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TMP where TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME )

/* This query deletes rows for each journalizing trigger, view or table if the table is no longer a part of the CDC Set */ delete from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> where (DB_OBJECT_TYPE, FULL_OBJECT_NAME) in ( select OBJ.DB_OBJECT_TYPE, OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and CDC.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and OBJ.DB_OBJECT_TYPE in ('TRIGGER', 'VIEW', 'TABLE') and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,"SNP_TMP_TABLE_LIST" , "W")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TMP where TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME ) )
alter table #DB_TABLE_NAME drop supplemental log group #DB_SHORT_NAME

/* This query returns a row for each journalizing trigger, view or table if the table is no longer a part of the CDC Set */ select substr(OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME, instr(OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME, '.')+1) DB_SHORT_NAME, OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME DB_TABLE_NAME from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and CDC.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and OBJ.DB_OBJECT_TYPE = 'LOGMINER TABLE' and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,"SNP_TMP_TABLE_LIST" , "W")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TMP where TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME )

/* This query returns a row for each journalizing trigger, view or table if the table is no longer a part of the CDC Set */ select substr(OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME, 1, instr(OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME, '.')-1) <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> DB_OBJECT_OWNER, substr(OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME, instr(OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME, '.')+1) <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> DB_OBJECT_NAME from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and CDC.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and OBJ.DB_OBJECT_TYPE = 'LOGMINER TABLE' and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,"SNP_TMP_TABLE_LIST" , "W")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TMP where TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME )

delete from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> where FULL_OBJECT_NAME in ( select OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and CDC.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and OBJ.DB_OBJECT_TYPE = 'LOGMINER TABLE' and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,"SNP_TMP_TABLE_LIST" , "W")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TMP where TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME ) ) and DB_OBJECT_TYPE = 'LOGMINER TABLE'
ALTER DATABASE ADD SUPPLEMENTAL LOG DATA
alter table <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> add supplemental log group <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("TABLE_NAME")%> ( <%=snpRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "PK")%> ) always

select FULL_TABLE_NAME <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") %> FULL_TABLE_NAME from <%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,"SNP_TMP_TABLE_LIST" , "W")%> <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD") %> TMP where TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TBL where TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%>' and OBJ.CDC_OBJECT_TYPE = 'JRN_FULL_NAME' )

select FULL_TABLE_NAME <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") %> FULL_TABLE_NAME from <%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,"SNP_TMP_TABLE_LIST" , "W")%> <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD") %> TMP where TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TBL where TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%>' and OBJ.CDC_OBJECT_TYPE = 'JRN_FULL_NAME' )

BEGIN DBMS_CDC_PUBLISH.CREATE_CHANGE_TABLE( owner => '<%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_WORK_SCHEMA")%>', change_table_name => '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_NAME")%>', change_set_name => '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" )%>', source_schema => '<%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_SCHEMA")%>', source_table => '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("TABLE_NAME")%>', column_type_list => '<%=snpRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME] [DEST_CRE_DT] ", ",", "", "PK")%>', capture_values => 'new', rs_id => 'n', row_id => 'n', user_id => 'n', timestamp => 'y', object_id => 'n', source_colmap => 'n', target_colmap => 'n', options_string => '<%=snpRef.getOption("JOURNAL_TABLE_OPTIONS")%>' ); END;

select FULL_TABLE_NAME <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") %> FULL_TABLE_NAME from <%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,"SNP_TMP_TABLE_LIST" , "W")%> <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD") %> TMP where TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TBL where TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%>' and OBJ.CDC_OBJECT_TYPE = 'JRN_FULL_NAME' )

insert into <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> ( FULL_TABLE_NAME, CDC_OBJECT_TYPE, FULL_OBJECT_NAME, DB_OBJECT_TYPE ) select /* FULL_TABLE_NAME */ '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>', /* CDC_OBJECT_TYPE */ 'JRN_FULL_NAME', /* FULL_OBJECT_NAME */ '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%>', /* DB_OBJECT_TYPE */ 'LOGMINER TABLE' from <%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,"SNP_TMP_TABLE_LIST" , "W")%> <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD") %> TMP where TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TBL where TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%>' and OBJ.CDC_OBJECT_TYPE = 'JRN_FULL_NAME' )

create or replace view <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_VIEW")%> as select decode(TARG.ROWID, null, 'D', 'I') <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_FLAG, JRN.CDC_TIMESTAMP <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_DATE, /* For V3 compatibility */ JRN.CDC_SUBSCRIBER <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_SUBSCRIBER, /* Renamed for V3 compatibility */ <%=snpRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME]	" + snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "PK")%>, <%=snpRef.getColList("", "TARG.[COL_NAME]	" + snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "NOT PK")%> from (select <%=snpRef.getColList("", "J.[COL_NAME]	" + snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ", ", "", "PK")%>, max(J.TIMESTAMP$) <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC_TIMESTAMP, SUB.CDC_SUBSCRIBER <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC_SUBSCRIBER from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> J, <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SUBS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUB where SUB.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and J.CSCN$ > SUB.MIN_WINDOW_ID and J.CSCN$ <= SUB.MAX_WINDOW_ID group by <%=snpRef.getColList("", "J.[COL_NAME]", ", ", "", "PK")%>, SUB.CDC_SUBSCRIBER ) <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN, <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TARG where <%=snpRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME]	= TARG.[COL_NAME] (+)", "
and	", "", "PK")%>

select FULL_TABLE_NAME <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") %> FULL_TABLE_NAME from <%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,"SNP_TMP_TABLE_LIST" , "W")%> <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD") %> TMP where TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TBL where TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_VIEW")%>' and OBJ.CDC_OBJECT_TYPE = 'JRN_FULL_VIEW' )

insert into <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> ( FULL_TABLE_NAME, CDC_OBJECT_TYPE, FULL_OBJECT_NAME, DB_OBJECT_TYPE ) select /* FULL_TABLE_NAME */ '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>', /* CDC_OBJECT_TYPE */ 'JRN_FULL_VIEW', /* FULL_OBJECT_NAME */ '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_VIEW")%>', /* DB_OBJECT_TYPE */ 'VIEW' from <%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,"SNP_TMP_TABLE_LIST" , "W")%> <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD") %> TMP where TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TBL where TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_VIEW")%>' and OBJ.CDC_OBJECT_TYPE = 'JRN_FULL_VIEW' )

create or replace view <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_DATA_VIEW")%> /* This view is created in the work physical schema of the current Data server */ as select decode(TARG.ROWID, null, 'D', 'I') <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_FLAG, JRN.CDC_TIMESTAMP <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_DATE, /* For V3 compatibility */ JRN.CDC_SUBSCRIBER <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_SUBSCRIBER, /* Renamed for V3 compatibility */ <%=snpRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME]	" + snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "PK")%>, <%=snpRef.getColList("", "TARG.[COL_NAME]	" + snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "NOT PK")%> from (select <%=snpRef.getColList("", "J.[COL_NAME]	" + snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ", ", "", "PK")%>, max(J.TIMESTAMP$) <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC_TIMESTAMP, SUB.CDC_SUBSCRIBER <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC_SUBSCRIBER from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> J, <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SUBS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUB where SUB.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and J.CSCN$ > SUB.MIN_WINDOW_ID /* We can use this filter safely because before the EXTEND_WINDOW, high values of CSCN$ are used */ group by <%=snpRef.getColList("", "J.[COL_NAME]", ", ", "", "PK")%>, SUB.CDC_SUBSCRIBER ) <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN, <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SUBS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUB, <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TARG where <%=snpRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME]	= TARG.[COL_NAME] (+)", "
and	", "", "PK")%>

select FULL_TABLE_NAME <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") %> FULL_TABLE_NAME from <%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,"SNP_TMP_TABLE_LIST" , "W")%> <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD") %> TMP where TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TBL where TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_DATA_VIEW")%>' and OBJ.CDC_OBJECT_TYPE = 'JRN_FULL_DATA_VIEW' )

insert into <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> ( FULL_TABLE_NAME, CDC_OBJECT_TYPE, FULL_OBJECT_NAME, DB_OBJECT_TYPE ) select /* FULL_TABLE_NAME */ '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>', /* CDC_OBJECT_TYPE */ 'JRN_FULL_DATA_VIEW', /* FULL_OBJECT_NAME */ '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_DATA_VIEW")%>', /* DB_OBJECT_TYPE */ 'VIEW' from <%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,"SNP_TMP_TABLE_LIST" , "W")%> <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD") %> TMP where TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TBL where TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_DATA_VIEW")%>' and OBJ.CDC_OBJECT_TYPE = 'JRN_FULL_DATA_VIEW' )

delCmd = """ delete from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SUBS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and CDC.CDC_SUBSCRIBER = ? """
# Prepare the delete prepDelStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(delCmd) # Execute it for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepDelStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepDelStmt.executeUpdate() prepDelStmt.close() myCon.commit()

delete from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and CDC.FULL_TABLE_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>'

update <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC set CDC.RETRIEVE_DATA = NULL, CDC.REFRESH_ROW_COUNT = 'update <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SUBS_TABLE")%> set CDC_ROW_COUNT = 0 where CDC_SUBSCRIBER = ''$$SUBSCRIBER_NAME$$'' and CDC_SET_NAME = ''<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>''' where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>'

BEGIN DBMS_CDC_PUBLISH.CREATE_CHANGE_SET( change_set_name => '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" )%>', description => 'Sunopsis change set for model : <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" )%>', <% if ("1".equals(snpRef.getOption("ASYNCHRONOUS_MODE"))) { %> change_source_name => 'HOTLOG_SOURCE', begin_date => sysdate <% } else { %> change_source_name => 'SYNC_SOURCE' <% } %> ); END;

insCmd = """ insert into <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SUBS_TABLE")%> ( CDC_SET_NAME, CDC_SUBSCRIBER, CDC_REFDATE, MIN_WINDOW_ID, MAX_WINDOW_ID, MAX_WINDOW_ID_DEL, MAX_WINDOW_ID_INS, CDC_ROW_COUNT ) select /* CDC_SET_NAME */ '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>', /* CDC_SUBSCRIBER */ ?, /* CDC_REFDATE */ sysdate, /* MIN_WINDOW_ID */ CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID, /* MAX_WINDOW_ID */ -1, /* MAX_WINDOW_ID_DEL */ -1, /* MAX_WINDOW_ID_INS */ -1, /* CDC_ROW_COUNT */ 0 from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' """
selCmd = """ select count('X') from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SUBS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and CDC.CDC_SUBSCRIBER = ? """
# Prepare the statements prepInsStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(insCmd) prepSelStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(selCmd) # Execute for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepSelStmt.setString(1, sbs) rs = prepSelStmt.executeQuery() rs.next() nbSubs = rs.getInt(1) if (nbSubs == 0): prepInsStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepInsStmt.executeUpdate() prepInsStmt.close() prepSelStmt.close() myCon.commit()

create table <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SUBS_TABLE" )%> ( CDC_SET_NAME <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR" , "255", "0" )%> not null, /* CDC Set Name (Sunopsis Model Code resolved with the Local Object syntax) */ CDC_SUBSCRIBER <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR" , "35", "0" )%> not null, /* Name of the subscriber who subscribed to the CDC Set */ CDC_REFDATE <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE")%> not null, /* Last record update */ MIN_WINDOW_ID <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> not null, /* Window Ids below this one should be ignored */ MAX_WINDOW_ID <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> not null, /* Maximum Window Id used by this subscription */ MAX_WINDOW_ID_DEL <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> not null, /* Maximum Window Id taken into consideration when checking consistency for deletes */ MAX_WINDOW_ID_INS <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> not null, /* Maximum Window Id taken into consideration when checking consistency for inserts / updates */ CDC_ROW_COUNT <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "10")%> not null, /* Number of rows in the journalizing tables for this subscription */ constraint PK_SNP_CDC_SBS primary key (CDC_SET_NAME, CDC_SUBSCRIBER) )

create table <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SET_TABLE" )%> ( CDC_SET_NAME <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR" , "255", "0" )%> not null, /* CDC Set Name (Sunopsis Model Code resolved with the Local Object syntax) */ CUR_WINDOW_ID <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> not null, /* Last window Id that has been used */ CUR_WINDOW_ID_DEL <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> not null, /* Last Window Id used to compute delete consistency */ CUR_WINDOW_ID_INS <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> not null, /* Last Window Id used to compute inert / update consistency */ RETRIEVE_DATA <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%> null, /* Command to execute in order to retrieve the journal data (used by the SnpsRetrieveJournalData API) */ REFRESH_ROW_COUNT <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%> null, /* Command to execute in order to refresh the row count(used by the SnpsRefreshJournalData API) */ constraint PK_SNP_CDC_SET primary key (CDC_SET_NAME) )

create table <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> ( CDC_SET_NAME <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR" , "255")%> not null, /* CDC Set Name (Sunopsis Model Code resolved with the Local Object syntax) */ FULL_TABLE_NAME <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "255")%> not null, /* Full name of the journalized table */ FULL_DATA_VIEW <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "255")%> not null, /* Full name of the journalizing data view */ RETRIEVE_DATA <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%> null, /* Command to execute to retrieve the journal data (used by the SnpsRetrieveJournalData API) */ REFRESH_ROW_COUNT <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%> null, /* Command to execute to refresh the row count (used by the SnpsRefresh RowCount API) */ constraint PK_SNP_CDC_TBL primary key (FULL_TABLE_NAME) )
select 'X' from dual where not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> where CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' )
select 'X' from dual where not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> where CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' )
select 'X' from dual where not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> where CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' )
select 'X' from dual where not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> where CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' )

import java.sql as sql import java.lang as lang
# Get the connection to Oracle myCon = snpRef.getJDBCConnection("SRC")
# Create the list of Subscribers for a CDC Set lstSbs = [] <%= snpRef.getSubscriberList("" , "lstSbs.append('[SUBSCRIBER]')", "\n", "") %>
select 'X' from dual where not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> where CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' )

<% if ("1".equals(snpRef.getOption("ASYNCHRONOUS_MODE"))) { %>
	/* If AUTO_CONFIGURATION is set, the STREAMS_POOL_SIZE was dynamically increased	*/
	/* We now dynamically decrease it by 21M				*/

	ALTER SYSTEM SET STREAMS_POOL_SIZE=#STREAMS_POOL_SIZE SCOPE=BOTH
<% } else { %>
	/* No need to unset the STREAMS_POOL_SIZE parameter in Synchronous mode */
<% } %>
select to_number(value)-(21*1024*1024) STREAMS_POOL_SIZE from V$PARAMETER where upper(name) = 'STREAMS_POOL_SIZE'

<% if ("1".equals(snpRef.getOption("ASYNCHRONOUS_MODE"))) { %>
	/* This statement will be executed only the first time the journal is created.	*/
	/* Afterwards, It is ignored thanks to the source query.		*/

	GRANT CREATE SEQUENCE TO <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>
<% } else { %>
	/* No need to grant the CREATE SEQUENCE privilege in Synchronous mode */
<% } %>
select 'X' from dual where not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> where CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' )
select 'X' from dual where not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> where CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' )
alter table <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> drop supplemental log group <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("TABLE_NAME")%>
select 'X' from dual where not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> where CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' )
select 'X' from dual where not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> where CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' )

<% if ("1".equals(snpRef.getOption("ASYNCHRONOUS_MODE"))) { %>
	/* This statement will be executed only the first time the journal is created.	*/
	/* Afterwards, It is ignored thanks to the source query.		*/

	GRANT DBA TO <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>
<% } else { %>
	/* No need to grant the DBA role in Synchronous mode */
<% } %>
select 'X' from dual where not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> where CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' )

<% if ("1".equals(snpRef.getOption("ASYNCHRONOUS_MODE"))) { %> This step will generetate a warning if the COMPATIBLE initialization parameter is not set to 10.1.0 or higher. This is the recommended value.
In order to change this value : ALTER SYSTEM SET COMPATIBLE='10.1.0' SCOPE=SPFILE
And restart your database
Note : This will be checked only the first time the journal is created. Afterwards, this statement is ignored thanks to the source query. <% } else { %> /* No need to check the COMPATIBLE parameter in Synchronous mode */ <% } %>

<% if ("1".equals(snpRef.getOption("ASYNCHRONOUS_MODE"))) { %> This step will generetate a warning if the database is not in archivelog mode.
In order to place your database in archivelog mode, perform the following operations : shutdown immediate startup mount alter database archivelog alter database open
Note : This will be checked only the first time the journal is created. Afterwards, this statement is ignored thanks to the source query. <% } else { %> /* No need to check the ARCHIVELOG parameter in Synchronous mode */ <% } %>

/* This query will return one row is the CDC Set is not already declared */ /* and if the ARCHIVELOG mode is not set for the database */ select 'X' from dual where not exists ( select 'X' from V$DATABASE where LOG_MODE = 'ARCHIVELOG' ) and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> where CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' )

/* This query will return one row, if the CDC Set is not already declared */ /* and if the JAVA_POOL_SIZE parameter is less than the recommended value. */ /* The recommended value is 50M */ select 'X' from V$PARAMETER where upper(name) = 'JAVA_POOL_SIZE' and case when upper(name) = 'JAVA_POOL_SIZE' then case when to_number(value) < 50000000 then 'NO' else 'OK' end else null end = 'NO'
/* only check when creating model or adding subscribers */ and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> where CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' )

<% if ("1".equals(snpRef.getOption("ASYNCHRONOUS_MODE"))) { %>

	/* This statement will be executed only the first time the journal is created.	*/
	/* Afterwards, It is ignored thanks to the source query.		*/

	ALTER SYSTEM SET JOB_QUEUE_PROCESSES=2 SCOPE=BOTH
<% } else { %>
	/* No need to set the JOB_QUEUE_PROCESSES parameter in Synchronous mode */
<% } %>

/* This query will return one row is the CDC Set is not already declared */ /* and if the JOB_QUEUE_PROCESS parameter is less than the recommended value. */ /* The recommended value is 2 */ select 'X' from V$PARAMETER where upper(name) = 'JOB_QUEUE_PROCESSES' and case when upper(name) = 'JOB_QUEUE_PROCESSES' then case when to_number(value) < 2 then 'NO' else 'OK' end else null end = 'NO'
/* only check when creating model or adding subscribers */ and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> where CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' )

<% if ("1".equals(snpRef.getOption("ASYNCHRONOUS_MODE"))) { %>
	/* If AUTO_CONFIGURATION is set, the PARALLEL_MAX_SERVER was dynamically increased by 5	*/
	/* We now dynamically decrease it by 5						*/

	ALTER SYSTEM SET PARALLEL_MAX_SERVERS=#PARALLEL_MAX_SERVERS SCOPE=BOTH
<% } else { %>
	/* No need to unset the PARALLEL_MAX_SERVERS parameter in Synchronous mode */
<% } %>
select to_number(value)-5 as PARALLEL_MAX_SERVERS from V$PARAMETER where upper(name) = 'PARALLEL_MAX_SERVERS'

update <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC set (CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID, CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID_INS, CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID_DEL) = (select LATEST_SCN, LATEST_SCN, LATEST_SCN from all_subscriptions where SUBSCRIPTION_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" )%>' ) where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>'

updCmd = """ update <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SUBS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUBS set ( SUBS.MAX_WINDOW_ID, SUBS.MAX_WINDOW_ID_INS, SUBS.MAX_WINDOW_ID_DEL ) = ( select CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID, CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID_INS, CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID_DEL from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' ) where SUBS.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and SUBS.CDC_SUBSCRIBER = ? """
# Prepare the update prepUpdStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(updCmd) # Execute it for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepUpdStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepUpdStmt.executeUpdate() prepUpdStmt.close() myCon.commit()

updCmd = """ update <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SUBS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUBS set SUBS.MIN_WINDOW_ID = SUBS.MAX_WINDOW_ID_INS where SUBS.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and SUBS.CDC_SUBSCRIBER = ? """
# Prepare the update prepUpdStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(updCmd) # Execute it for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepUpdStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepUpdStmt.executeUpdate() prepUpdStmt.close() myCon.commit()

/* Delete rows from journalizing tables that are useless for each subscriber */ delete from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN where JRN.CSCN$ <= ( select min(SUBS.MIN_WINDOW_ID) from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SUBS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUBS where SUBS.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' )

<% if ("1".equals(snpRef.getOption("ASYNCHRONOUS_MODE"))) { %>
	/* This statement will be executed only the first time the journal is created.	*/
	/* Afterwards, It is ignored thanks to the source query.		*/

	ALTER SYSTEM SET PARALLEL_MAX_SERVERS=#PARALLEL_MAX_SERVERS SCOPE=BOTH
<% } else { %>
	/* No need to set the PARALLEL_MAX_SERVERS parameter in Synchronous mode */
<% } %>

<% if ("1".equals(snpRef.getOption("ASYNCHRONOUS_MODE"))) { %>

	/* This statement will be executed only the first time the journal is created.	*/
	/* Afterwards, It is ignored thanks to the source query.		*/

	ALTER SYSTEM SET STREAMS_POOL_SIZE=#STREAMS_POOL_SIZE SCOPE=BOTH
<% } else { %>
	/* No need to set the STREAMS_POOL_SIZE parameter in Synchronous mode */
<% } %>

<% if ("1".equals(snpRef.getOption("ASYNCHRONOUS_MODE"))) { %>
	/* This statement will be executed only the first time the journal is created.	*/
	/* Afterwards, It is ignored thanks to the source query.		*/
	ALTER SYSTEM SET UNDO_RETENTION=3600 SCOPE=BOTH

<% } else { %>
	/* No need to set the UNDO_RETENTION parameter in Synchronous mode */
<% } %>

/* This query will return one row is the CDC Set is not already declared */ /* and if the UNDO_RETENTION parameter is less than the recommended value. */ /* The recommended value is 3600 */ select 'X' from V$PARAMETER where upper(name) = 'UNDO_RETENTION' and case when upper(name) = 'UNDO_RETENTION' then case when to_number (value) < 3600 then 'NO' else 'OK' end else null end = 'NO'
and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> where CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' )

<% if ("1".equals(snpRef.getOption("ASYNCHRONOUS_MODE"))) { %>

	/* This statement will be executed only the first time the journal is created.	*/
	/* Afterwards, It is ignored thanks to the source query.		*/

	ALTER DATABASE FORCE LOGGING
<% } else { %>
	/* No need to force the LOGGING mode on the database in Synchronous mode */
<% } %>
select 'X' from dual where not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> where CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' )
select 'X' from dual where not exists ( select 'X' from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> where CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' )
Delete table from CDC Objects table

/* This query returns a row for each journalizing trigger, view or table if the table is no longer a part of the CDC Set */ select OBJ.DB_OBJECT_TYPE <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> DB_OBJECT_TYPE, OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> DB_OBJECT_NAME, case when upper (OBJ.DB_OBJECT_TYPE) = 'TABLE' then 'PURGE' else '' end <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> DROP_OPTION from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and CDC.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and OBJ.DB_OBJECT_TYPE in ('TRIGGER', 'VIEW', 'TABLE')
alter table #DB_TABLE_NAME drop supplemental log group #DB_SHORT_NAME

/* This query returns a row for each journalizing trigger, view or table if the table is no longer a part of the CDC Set */ select substr(OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME, instr(OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME, '.')+1) <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> DB_SHORT_NAME, OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> DB_TABLE_NAME from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and CDC.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and OBJ.DB_OBJECT_TYPE = 'LOGMINER TABLE'

/* This query returns a row for each journalizing trigger, view or table if the table is no longer a part of the CDC Set */ select substr(OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME, 1, instr(OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME, '.')-1) <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> DB_OBJECT_OWNER, substr(OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME, instr(OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME, '.')+1) <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> DB_OBJECT_NAME from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=snpRef.getObjectName("L" ,snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_COD_MOD" ) , "D")%>' and CDC.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and OBJ.DB_OBJECT_TYPE = 'LOGMINER TABLE'
